name: Half-moon in the stream (Eng. ver)
description:
Banana Fish brief fangame made by fans for fans. 

A fangame for Ash and Eiji from Banana Fish. 

Can be installed on PC, Mac  and Android.

 (I'm trying to understand iOS, not available for now.)

-Available on Spanish and English.

- A visual   kinetic novel (15 minutes probably)

- 1 branch, Two povs of the same story.  

- 1 ending with 2 povs.

- Self indulgent, almost angsty. 

- This is 100% free, but I appreciate some donation for next more complex and complete projects. 

This is my first vn (This is more like a kinetic novel tho).  Was very experimental, just to try out the software, don't be harsh on me pls ;v;.
